item1:
程序基本数据维护
Program basic data maintenance
item2:
管理立库程序的基本数据、是否启用
Manage the basic data of the WES program, whether to enable it
item4:
有管理权限的使用者
Users with administrative rights
item5:
程序编码、程序名称
Program ID, program name
item6:
程序基本数据
Program basic data
item7:
如果无符合条件的程序数据，系统将提示查无此程序信息
If there is no qualified program data, the system will prompt to check for no program information
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选程序编码后点选Query查询程序数据
Enter query conditions or select program code and click Query to query program data
item9:
执行S050 Program Authorization by Group或S060 Program Authorization by User确认程序的使用权限
Execute S050 Program Authorization by Group or S060 Program Authorization by User to confirm the use right of the program
